name: Servicing Issue
description: This Service Domain handles production customer servicing issues detected in the customer servicing environment

serviceOperations.name: Detect Servicing Issue
serviceOperations.description: Identifies and logs production customer servicing issues

serviceOperations.name: Resolve Servicing Issue
serviceOperations.description: Manages the resolution process for detected servicing issues

serviceOperations.name: Monitor Issue Status
serviceOperations.description: Tracks the status and progress of servicing issue resolution

functionalRequirements: Real-time issue detection in customer servicing environment
